name: Employees with Current Salary
query:
SELECT 
    `tabEmployee`.`employee` AS `Employee`,
    `tabEmployee`.`employee_name` AS `Employee Name`,
   `tabEmployee`.`date_of_joining` AS `Joined`,
   `tabEmployee`.`designation` AS `Designation`,
   `tabEmployee`.`grade` AS `Grade`,
   `tabEmployee`.`payroll_cost_center` AS `Cost Center`,
   `tabEmployee`.`bank_name` AS `Bank`,
   `tabEmployee`.`bank_ac_no` AS `Bank Account`,
   `tabEmployee`.`working_status` AS `Working Status`,
    `tabEmployee`.`visa_company` AS `Visa`,
    `tabEmployee`.`salary_hold` AS `Salary Hold`,
   `tabEmployee`.`bank_ac_no` AS `Bank Account`,
      `tabEmployee`.`salary_mode` AS `Salary Mode`,
    `tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`salary_structure` AS `Salary Structure`,
    `tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`from_date` AS `From Date`,
    `tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`base` AS `Basic`,
    `tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`hra` AS `HRA`,
      `tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`food` AS `Food`,
    `tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`transport` AS `Transport`,
    `tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`others` AS `others`,
    `tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`living` AS `Living`,
    `tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`fixed_overtime` AS `Fixed OT`,
    `tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`utility` AS `Utility`,
    `tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`gsm` AS `GSM`,
    `tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`total_monthly_salary` AS `Total`,
    `tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`monthly_pay` AS `Base for Overtime`,
    `tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`workflow_state` AS `Approval Status`,
   `tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`company` AS `Company`
   
FROM 
    `tabEmployee`
INNER JOIN
    `tabSalary Structure Assignment`
ON
    `tabEmployee`.`name` = `tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`employee`
WHERE
`tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`docstatus` = 1
 AND `tabEmployee`.`status` = 'Active'
 AND 

    `tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`from_date` = (
        SELECT 
            MAX(`from_date`)
        FROM 
            `tabSalary Structure Assignment`
        WHERE 
            `tabEmployee`.`name` = `tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`employee`
		and `tabSalary Structure Assignment`.`docstatus` = 1
    );
